data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Erevan, Armenia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Erevan, Armenia

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 97,307 believers in Erevan and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Erevan, Armenia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Erevan, Armenia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Erevan, Armenia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 97,307 believers in Erevan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 97,307 believers in Erevan.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Erevan, Armenia has a population of 1,060,100.

We estimate Erevan has 97,307 people who might know Jesus, 882,888 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 79,904 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.
